CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION catastro_gdl.sp_zonas_list()
 RETURNS TABLE(zona text, total_licencias bigint)
 LANGUAGE plpgsql
AS $function$
      BEGIN
        RETURN QUERY
        SELECT
          CASE
            WHEN t.zona IS NOT NULL THEN 'Zona ' || t.zona::text
            ELSE 'Sin zona'
          END::text as zona,
          COUNT(DISTINCT t.id_licencia) as total_licencias
        FROM informix.tramites t
        WHERE
          t.id_licencia IS NOT NULL
          AND t.estatus IN ('A', 'V...

          t.zona as zona_id,
          ('Zona ' || t.zona::text)::text as zona_descripcion,

          AND t.estatus IN ('A', 'V', 'S...
